front.title: SIP INFO Method for Event Reporting

abstract.t: This document describes the use of the SIP INFO Method for communicating mid-call events in SIP [1] sessions. Two new MIME types are described, according to the rules defined in RFC 2046 [2], for use in the INFO message. These media types can be used within a SIP INFO message to request, and report, event detection between SIP network entities. Emphasis is placed on DTMF signaling to communicate user indications when using SIP between a Media Gateway Controller (MGC) and a SIP application.
